data_directory: The parent path for raw data. The raw data path is data_directory/case_[num_array]/image_nama. [ex] $HOME/Desktop/data/Abdomen
save_directory: We save patch image under save_directory/case_[num_array]. You must add /image to the end of the path. [ex] $HOME/Desktop/data/patch/Abdomen/28-44-44-1/mask/image
